LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Plasteel.label: Install Plasteel Carapace
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Plasteel.description: Implants plasteel into the Arachne's carapace. As the carapace tissue grows, the plasteel is encased, forming a stronger exoskeleton and enhancing the bug's defense.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Shell_Thorn.label: Install Carapace Thorns
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Shell_Thorn.descript: Implants two rows of thorn cavities into the Arachne's carapace. These are semi-autonomous organs that automatically launch spines at nearby enemies. This mutation also thickens the carapace, improving defense.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Reactive_Shell.label: Install Reactive Carapace
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Reactive_Shell.descr: Implants a special reactive carapace into the Arachne. This temporarily activates, shedding the carapace to protect the main body when an attack is imminent.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Carapace_Shell.label: Install Carapace Growth
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Carapace_Shell.descr: Uses carapace tissue to increase the thickness of the Arachne's carapace, granting additional defensive capability.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Strengthening_Tendon: Implants strengthening tendons into the Arachne's legs, granting higher movement speed and short-distance jumping ability.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Slide_Patagium.label: Install Gliding Patagium
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Slide_Patagium.descr: Implants gliding patagia into the Arachne's legs, significantly increasing movement speed on fungoid ground.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Huge_Stomach.label: Install Additional Gastric Pouch
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Huge_Stomach.descrip: Induces a directed mutation in the Arachne to expand its nutrient-storing gastric pouch, allowing it to store more food.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Internal_Circulation: Induces a directed mutation in the Arachne, allowing its lungs to self-circulate, making it capable of surviving near-vacuum conditions.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Cycle_Suppression.de: Induces a directed mutation in the Arachne, allowing it to live longer without the constraints of its natural lifespan. However, injecting life cycle suppressors causes it to lose its self-healing ability.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Acidling_Pouch.label: Install Acidling Hatching Pouch
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Acidling_Pouch.descr: Induces a directed mutation in the Arachne to generate a pouch that stores three embryonic acidlings. When released, they assault enemies with suicidal attacks.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Tumor_Pouch.label: Install Tumor Hatching Pouch
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Tumor_Pouch.descript: Induces a directed mutation in the Arachne to store one withered tumor in a hatching pouch. When released, it transforms the surrounding ground into fungoid terrain.
LanguageData.ARA_CureAcid.label: Remove Neurotoxin
LanguageData.ARA_CureAcid.description: The Arachne hive can use healing tissue to remove the effects of the neurotoxin they release, returning the prey to a normal state.
LanguageData.ARA_CureAcid.successfullyRemovedHediffMe: {0} has successfully removed the Arachne neurotoxin from {1}'s body.
LanguageData.ARA_CureBloodRot.label: Remove Pseudonematode Infection
LanguageData.ARA_CureBloodRot.description: The surgery to eradicate Arachne pseudonematodes from the patient's body using a combination of targeted drugs is extremely complex and can only be performed with cutting-edge medicine provided by Glitterworld.
LanguageData.ARA_CureBloodRot.successfullyRemovedHedi: {0} has successfully removed the pseudonematode infection from {1}'s body.
